channel.title: ERRORS need help please
channel.description:
does anyone know a working mute and unmute for a none delta base server??
thanks,

item.title: ERRORS need help please
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:16, topic:262705”]client.java:9925: muted is already defined in client
Read that as it is, and it will explain your error.[/quote]

ah, so i didnt need to add:

public boolean validClient = true, muted = false;

Read full topic

item.title: ERRORS need help please
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

kk guys, i added this:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    c.muted = true;
		sendMessage("You have muted "+playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

i then got this error:

client.java:10857: incompatible types found : boolean required: int c.muted = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

so i added this at the top of the file:

public boolean validClient = true, muted = false;

and got this error:

client.java:9925: muted is already defined in client public int muted = 0; // 0 = unmuted 1 = muted ^ client.java:12415: incomparable types: boolean and int if (muted == 1) { ^ client.java:13155: incomparable types: boolean and int if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && muted == 0 ) { ^ client.java:13161: incomparable types: boolean and int } else if (muted == 1) { ^ client.java:14887: incompatible types found : int required: boolean muted = 0; ^ client.java:14889: incompatible types found : int required: boolean muted = 1; ^ client.java:19745: incomparable types: boolean and int if (muted == 1) { ^ client.java:19747: incomparable types: boolean and int } else if (muted == 0) { ^ client.java:20285: incompatible types found : int required: boolean rp.muted = 1; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 9 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

could any help me please?

Read full topic

item.title: ERRORS need help please
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Make a boolean called isMuted or w/e, and go to the chat packet and make it so if the boolean is true, the player cannot talk.

Read full topic

Stay on topic please guys. Just ctrl + f mute and copy and paste all the mute statements in delta. Then create a mutes.txt in config. - Only thing I can think of, sorry.
